cab.content: 25 From Viceroy, Foreign Department, 3\st July 1917. (Received 9 p.m.) Secret. Mahsiids still busy collecting rifles which they are handing indaily. Up to 30th July 180 military and 30 militia rifles, with 10 prisonersincluding kidnapped persons, have been surrendered. Jirga has not yetassembled to ratify agreement, but it is considered Maliks, so far fromyjroorastinating to evade surrender of rifles, are actuated by desire to falfij- v^Jk^tm*3fttr of- number before coming in so as to ensure final and completesettlement!
